data.eml:eml: Boraras naevus, a new species of miniature and sexually dichromatic freshwater fish from peninsular Thailand (Ostariophysi: Cyprinidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Conway, Kevin W., Kottelat, And Maurice (2011): Boraras naevus, a new species of miniature and sexually dichromatic freshwater fish from peninsular Thailand (Ostariophysi: Cyprinidae). Zootaxa 3002: 45-51, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.201020
